post.title: i was a substitute teacher in all grade levels in 5 counties, AMA

body:
So youre saying that because I witnessed routine, totally normalised insane displays of war fervor, nationalistic fervor, traumatizing and just vicious sexual repression and censorship, and unquestioning adulation of authoritarian personalities and policies, and because I quite reasonably objected, and because i quite decently felt compelled to address this to impressionable and uninformed children, that this is evidence of both a coordinated attack on whatever AND of my deliberate, willing and paid participation in such an operation.


Once, in the hall at one high school the speaker crackled as it turned on.  The regular teachers were well familiar w the proceeding i suppose and knew the national anthem would then start.  I'm standing next to the doors to a stair well.

A male teacher had pushed the door open intent on entering.  But, upon hearing the crackle he stopped dead in his tracks.  He stood at something like Attention but w no dignity or gravity or presence of mind; it was i thought immediately a North Korean expression on his face.  So the anthem starts and he hasn't moved a step as the door is closing on him.

He stands there as the anthem plays and the door closes; so they don't slam on kids they have the pneumatic or whatever feature where the last few inches very gradually shut: it's inches from his face then centimeters and finally shuts completely almost touching his nose, which never even flinched.  At no time did his expression change. 

Another time, another school, im in the teachers lounge when the speaker crackles.  I have no duties until after the home room period and im not allowed to leave the building so im settled in my chair reading Lewrockwell on my phone.

Flag salute comes on and i don't care.  I'm a grown man and a civilian and not on duty.  No kids see me.  Im reading.  

BANG BANG BANG; Heavy rings on the desk right near my face.  I look up and a woman is angrily gesturing for me to rise; i say "oh i don't do that, it's a religious thing."  Jehovah witnesses don't salute flags.  Jesus said take no oaths.  

So i thought being in a public school that would settle the matter.  She waits for the obligatory nation spectacle to conclude and then sets in on me.  
 
She harangues me for a period of minutes to the point that i report to my first class late.  I was physically cornered as she yelled in my face and aggressively swung her hands in my space.  She's NEVER HEARD OF SUCH A RELIGION and Im NOT IN THE NFL and a great many other such dehumanizing remarks.  Other teachers initially looked away and down and eventually all had just left without saying anything.

Another time, im in in-school suspension. Ghetto school, football players w kids of their own.  Every bit physically as threatening as men could be.  Im surrounded by them as i enter and they geab at my ID badge and dictate my name to another kid already on Google.  They touch my sleeves and roll them up to see my tattoos.

So they ask about them and i explain that i don't wannna be the guy talking about his tattoos but "it's basically a tarot card" to let them move the fuck past it.

There's an aide present the whole time who never stopped playing on her phone.  I learned the next day when i tried to report for duty thst i was banned from the school because the aide reported i was "talking to the children about my satanic worship and indoctrinating them into the occult."

Absurd ultra conservstive fucking Baptist fantasy land and in public school.  Totally backed by administration and totally normalised routine culture there.

Not a leftist.  Not a feminist.  Just generally informed by the 2 perspectives and capable of considering them without a mongoloid goyim emotional tantrum response.  Also a healthy respect for academic culture enough to teach kids of their existence.

Oh in another school i did an AP US history course, kids are supposedly learning about early  20th century Labor movements; not one even recognized the word "proletarian."  Very far right marinade.
